Name: Nervous System Functions Lesson for Kids
Subject: ['disorders', 'health and fitness', 'chronic pain', 'disease', 'epilepsy']
Description: In this lesson, we'll discuss the nervous system and its function. You'll learn about the main parts of the nervous system - the central and peripheral nervous systems - and how they function in the body.
